roottImplants.heroSubtitle: The advanced implant system with exceptional surface purity and innovative design
roottImplants.overviewDescription: ROOTT is a comprehensive implant system offering versatile solutions for all clinical cases. With a unique surface treatment and exceptional purity, ROOTT implants deliver predictable and reliable results.
roottImplants.typesDescription: The ROOTT system includes various implant types designed to meet specific clinical requirements and anatomical situations.

descriptions.R: One-piece implant with high primary stability and immediate loading potential. Ideal for single-tooth restorations.
descriptions.S: Narrow diameter implant for limited spaces and reduced bone volume. Perfect for anterior tooth replacements.
descriptions.M: Two-piece implant system with multiple connection options suitable for various restorative needs.
descriptions.P: Specialized for post-extraction immediate placement with a progressive thread design.
descriptions.C: Designed for challenging situations with reduced bone height, featuring a short body and wide diameter.
descriptions.BS: Basal implant for advanced cases with minimal bone volume in the posterior regions.
descriptions.B: Versatile basal implant option with excellent primary stability and load distribution.

R: Transgingival neck for optimal tissue integration
B: Excellent stability in poor bone quality

roottImplants.toolsDescription: Specialized instruments designed for precise and efficient implant placement and restoration.
roottImplants.surgicalKitDescription: Comprehensive set of drills, drivers, and accessories for all ROOTT implant placement procedures.
roottImplants.prostheticToolsDescription: Specialized tools for impression taking, prosthetic component placement, and final restoration.
roottImplants.qualityDescription: ROOTT implants undergo rigorous quality testing to ensure the highest standards of purity and performance.
roottImplants.analysisDescription: Independent studies confirm that ROOTT implants feature a surface free of contamination, promoting optimal osseointegration.
roottImplants.guidesTitle: OPEN SURGICAL GUIDES FOR DENTAL APPLICATIONS
roottImplants.guidesDescription: Precision-guided implant placement using the latest digital planning technology.
roottImplants.certificationsDescription: ROOTT implants meet the highest international standards for medical devices and dental implants.

partners.title: Our Strategic Partners
partners.subtitle: Farmamedical collaborates with industry-leading manufacturers to deliver premium dental solutions across the Balkans region
partners.exclusiveDesc: We maintain exclusive distribution relationships with premium dental manufacturers, ensuring quality products and exceptional support for dental professionals
partners.trateDesc: Farmamedical is the exclusive distributor of Trate AG's ROOTT Implant Systems in Bosnia and Herzegovina, Croatia, and Serbia. These Swiss-designed implants are renowned for their exceptional surface purity and innovative design.
partners.keroxDesc: As the authorized distributor for Kerox Dental products, Farmamedical offers high-quality zirconia discs, ceramic blanks, and specialized materials for dental laboratories and CAD/CAM systems throughout the Balkans region
partners.advantageDesc: Through our strategic partnerships, we offer comprehensive solutions and support to dental professionals
partners.becomeDesc: Are you a dental manufacturer looking for distribution in the Balkans region?
partners.certificationsDesc: All our partner products meet the highest international standards and certifications

roott.title: ROOTT Dental Implants
roott.subtitle: ROOTT Implants offers the greatest variety of dental implants amongst the major dental implant providers. Working with the leading Dental Professional community, ROOTT has extended its implant range to offer solutions to potentially avoid bone grafting
roott.completeSystemDesc: ROOTT offers one-piece implants with an innovative 15 degree bendable neck. The extra flexibility aids Practitioners to improve the positioning to create a parallel to the crest and anchorage to the atrophied bone. These implants provide solutions that may have not been possible without preparatory bone restoration work
roott.perfectFitDesc: ROOTT implants are designed to provide exceptional primary stability with tight tolerances that ensure there's no gap and no movement, resulting in better integration and long-term success
roott.coldWeldDesc: The innovative cold weld connection in ROOTT implants creates a secure, bacteria-free seal between the implant and abutment, reducing the risk of peri-implantitis and ensuring long-term stability
roott.multiUnit: ROOTT IMPLANT System: One Platform Multi-unit
roott.practitionersDesc: The ROOTT Implant system has been designed with the Practitioner at the forefront of the design. ROOTT has sought to simplify implantology, improving primary anchorage, reducing healing times and saving Dental Practitioners time
roott.toolboxDesc: The toolbox has been carefully designed to assist Practitioners follow a simple step-by-step graphical guide. Following through the steps, Practitioners should achieve a strong anchorage and lower the risk of failure
roott.compatibilityDesc: The tools follow a visual guide aligned with different types of implants, providing compatible tooling across the majority of the implant range, leading to fewer tools
roott.colorCodingDesc: ROOTT's color coding system understands the challenges of working with numerous components in implantology. The carefully color-coded accessories make it easier for Practitioners to help ensure they are working with the correct component
roott.technologyDesc: Explore the innovative features and benefits of ROOTT implant systems
roott.primaryStabilityDesc: ROOTT implants are designed to achieve excellent primary stability for predictable outcomes
roott.conicalConnectionDesc: The deep conical connection ensures a secure, bacteria-free seal between implant and abutment
roott.extraThinDesc: ROOTT implants feature optimized wall thickness for strength without compromising design
roott.narrowRidgeDesc: Specially designed for challenging cases with limited bone width in narrow ridge areas
roott.screwRetainedDesc: Multiple screw-retained prosthetic options for secure and retrievable restorations
roott.multifunctionalDesc: Versatile components that adapt to various clinical scenarios and requirements
roott.solutionsDesc: ROOTT offers a complete range of implant types designed for specific clinical requirements and anatomical situations
roott.toolsDesc: Precision-engineered surgical tools designed for efficient and predictable implant placement
roott.kitDesc: All tools have their own reserved spot in a neat and tidy toolbox. The well-organized design ensures that practitioners can easily identify and access the required instruments during surgical procedures
roott.healingAbutmentsDesc: ROOTT offers a comprehensive range of healing abutments in various heights and diameters to optimize soft tissue contouring and ensure excellent aesthetic outcomes for each individual case
roott.manufacturingDesc: ROOTT brand of dental Implants is manufactured by TRATE, which has an international team of experienced open-minded professionals who love what they are doing and apply their knowledge for creating safe high-quality products
roott.qmsDesc: TRATE operates on the quality management system based on EU MDR 2017/745. Products are certified in compliance with the provisions of the European Medical Device Regulation 2017/745
roott.rndDesc: TRATE Research & Development department works closely with highly skilled specialists to ensure ROOTT Implants are well designed, giving practitioners the reassurance they are working with an amazing range of products
roott.brochureDesc: Download our comprehensive product brochure for complete information about the ROOTT Implant System
roott.certificationDesc: ROOTT implants meet the highest international standards for medical devices and dental implants
roott.contactDesc: Get expert advice on ROOTT implant systems and learn how they can enhance your clinical outcomes and practice efficiency

kerox.title: Kerox Dental
kerox.subtitle: Premium zirconia materials and solutions for dental laboratories and CAD/CAM milling centers
kerox.quote: Setting the standard for high-quality dental zirconia materials with exceptional esthetics and durability.
kerox.aboutDesc: Founded in 2002, Kerox Dental has become a leading manufacturer of high-quality dental materials, specializing in zirconia solutions for CAD/CAM applications.
kerox.excellenceDesc: Based in Hungary, Kerox Dental has established itself as an innovator in the field of dental ceramics. Their state-of-the-art manufacturing facility produces premium zirconia materials that are distributed to dental laboratories worldwide.
kerox.productLineDesc: Premium zirconia solutions designed for optimal esthetics and performance
kerox.scienceDesc: Understanding the advanced materials science that makes Kerox zirconia exceptional
kerox.certificationsDesc: Meeting the highest international standards for quality and safety
kerox.advancedDesc: Kerox Dental's state-of-the-art manufacturing facility in Hungary employs the latest technology and quality control processes to ensure consistent, high-quality zirconia products.
kerox.supportDesc: We provide comprehensive support for dental laboratories working with Kerox materials
kerox.requestDesc: Contact Farmamedical for detailed information about Kerox zirconia products, technical specifications, and pricing.

eventDetails.moreInfoDesc: Download the complete event brochure with detailed information about speakers, sessions, venue, and accommodations.
